---
name: PR/Issue
about: tmplate for PR, Issue
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

간결하고 명확하게 (예: feat: 로그인 API 추가)

## Issue
### Issue details(what you gonna do)
### Expected behavior
### related issue or PR(#issue number)
### screenshot
### Additional information

## PR
### PR details(what have you done)
### related issue (#issue number)
### Expected behavior
### Actual behavior
### screenshot
### Additional information
